Html:
in your documentation, you mentioned that;
"(name): loads the page in the frame having specified name"

i tried applying it like this

<mui:BBCodeBlock BBCode="[url=/Pages/MyPage.xaml|_(example)]go to my page[/url]" />?

and

<mui:BBCodeBlock BBCode="[url=/Pages/MyPage.xaml|_example]go to my page[/url]" />?

and even without the underscores but i keep getting the error message my frame was not found.

could you please give an example just so I can understand the context you ment it in?
Nevermind. I just discovered this could only be applied to the ModernFrame. Appologies for wasting your time. Everything's working now.
